snippet: Heineken selects Saatchi & Saatchi New York to handle the Tecate account, and Colleen DeCourcy is named the chairwoman of the 2015 International Andy Awards.
lead_paragraph: Heineken selects Saatchi & Saatchi New York to handle the Tecate account, and Colleen DeCourcy is named the chairwoman of the 2015 International Andy Awards.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
